version_description:
- Added short gaming videos (clips)
- Added video editing features for clips
- Redesigned stream start page #2
- Added content language to separate clips and livestreams by different regions
- Video player now supports resolution selection for promoted livestreams
- Fixed various bugs and crashes
- improved app stability and reliability

- Added short gaming videos (clips)
- Added video editing features for clips
- Redesigned stream start page #2
- Added content language to separate clips and livestreams by different regions
- Video player now supports resolution selection for promoted livestreams
- Fixed various bugs and crashes
- improved app stability and reliability

You can see a stream summary at the end of your stream now
Picture in Picture mode is here! Multitask while you watch stream
Stability improvement and bug fixes

You can now connect your Free Fire game account with BOOYAH! account to be eligible for awesome events
Bug fixes and performance improvements

You can now connect your Free Fire game account with BOOYAH! account to be eligible for awesome events
Bug fixes and performance improvements

Streamer program is here! Become a professional streamer at BOOYAH! and earn your reward!
Chat stickers are coming your way, send these stickers in your favourite streamer's channel
Watch VOD from top streamers even when they are offline, catch up with what you missed
Bug fixes and improvements

BOOYAH! Tickets and free gift is here!
You can send the Free Gift to the streamers you support by consuming BOOYAH! tickets. Free Gifts can boost their popularity to make their ranking higher in the streamer list. It also pushes the streamer higher in the leaderboard ranking in the coming versions
Bug fixes and improvements

BOOYAH! Rankings has arrived! Check out who are the super stars here!
Send both free and coin gift, support your favorite streamers to boost their rank!
Bug fixes and improvements

Daily missions has arrived, come to BOOYAH! to see how many missions you can complete each day!
Time limited events are here, remember to complete them in time for amazing prizes
A new Profile Page, with all your favourite functions, more accessible.
Bug fixes and improvements

Daily login for daily reward, come everyday for the grand prize!
Push notifications are prettier now with icons
Bug fixes and user experience improvements

News center is here, check out what is going on in BOOYAH!
Select your stream tags before streaming for your fans to discover you more easily
Bug fixes and performance improvements

News center is here, check out what is going on in BOOYAH!
Select your stream tags before streaming for your fans to discover you more easily
Bug fixes and performance improvements

-Hosting feature is here! You will start to see your favourite streamers hosting others in their channels, be sure to check them out!
-Bug fixes and performance improvements

-Hosting feature is here! You will start to see your favourite streamers hosting others in their channels, be sure to check them out!
-Bug fixes and performance improvements

-In Real Life streaming (IRL) is here! Check out this new genre of content from your favourite streamers, only on BOOYAH!
-Streamers are able to configure your social links under streamer before you start streaming for your fans to easily follow you
-Bug fixes and performance improvements
